guild.description:
Here we go again...

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/post/66iv/ee_ubwXLfNg)

*Cabal*: n. the contrived schemes of a group of persons secretly united in a plot - also: a group engaged in such schemes.

*Powermod*: n. [short for power moderator] a person of power, usually a moderator on a structured website, that takes too many unpopulist stances

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
guild.description_html:
Here we go again...

This guild is dedicated to whistleblowing and preventing powermods and the forming of a powermod oligarchy which would censor opinions and lead Ruqqus into the same corruption that is killing Reddit.
guild.name: The_Cabal

title: When you think you've finally escaped to a truly free speech site

author.bio:
You're here to downvote every post on my profile and/or search for something to bitch about due to losing an an argument

The following is true:

-You're angry that I said something unfavorable to Nazis.

-You're a coward with a private profile.
author.bio_html:
You're here to downvote every post on my profile and/or search for something to bitch about due to losing an an argument

The following is true:

-You're angry that I said something unfavorable to Nazis.

-You're a coward with a private profile.

body: Reminder that this guy was a discord power user and Ruqqus code contributor with numerous connections who turned on them because he didn't get as much power as he wanted. He has posts simping for the same people he's bitching about now. He'll betray anyone who doesn't give him what he wants.

He has posts simping for the same people he's bitching about now. He'll betray anyone who doesn't give him what he wants.

body:
When was I ever a discord power user? The admins always hated me and there are posts about it in this guild from many months ago.

Also github is open to anyone. But the discord mods have write access which the rest of us do not, including me.

post.title: When you think you've finally escaped to a truly free speech site

author.bio:
You're here to downvote every post on my profile and/or search for something to bitch about due to losing an an argument

The following is true:

-You're angry that I said something unfavorable to Nazis.

-You're a coward with a private profile.
author.bio_html:
You're here to downvote every post on my profile and/or search for something to bitch about due to losing an an argument

The following is true:

-You're angry that I said something unfavorable to Nazis.

-You're a coward with a private profile.

body:
The number of badges on your profile shows you're a power user. Almost nobody else has that many badges they have to be granted by the admins directly on request. Your profile description has you simping for some of the same people you say are a cabal now.

You whine about how jealous you are of Seq in this comment among others:
https://ruqqus.com/+AskRuqqus/post/631x/conservatives-why-have-you-forsaken-libertarianism/lcp8?context=3

You're throwing a tantrum because you didn't get the source code permissions you wanted because CaptainMeta knew you were incompetent and would fuck something up.

You're just a Benedict Arnold whose angry that you didn't get the rank you wanted.

This is the post that sparked his decision to switch from the Nonpolitical faction to the Nazi faction.

![](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/791395672841519137/792935915789615124/Screenshot_20201228-050242_Chrome.png)
body_html:
The number of badges on your profile shows you're a power user. Almost nobody else has that many badges they have to be granted by the admins directly on request. Your profile description has you simping for some of the same people you say are a cabal now.

You whine about how jealous you are of Seq in this comment among others: https://ruqqus.com/+AskRuqqus/post/631x/conservatives-why-have-you-forsaken-libertarianism/lcp8?context=3

You're throwing a tantrum because you didn't get the source code permissions you wanted because CaptainMeta knew you were incompetent and would fuck something up.

You're just a Benedict Arnold whose angry that you didn't get the rank you wanted.

This is the post that sparked his decision to switch from the Nonpolitical faction to the Nazi faction.

author.bio:

author.bio_html:

body:
> Almost nobody else has that many badges they have to be granted by the admins directly on request.

I only have two of those badges. Seq, acikek, sfrohne, etc. all have more than me (and deservedly too because I *suck* at everything).

> Your profile description has you simping for some of the same people you say are a cabal now.

There's not a proper cabal yet. Most of them are just mindlessly having fun in RCP, or in the case of discord mods don't notice anything. The admins just give them special treatment and that's about it, but that's a big deal.

> This is the post that sparked his decision to switch from the Nonpolitical faction to the Nazi faction.

Wdym?
body_html:
Almost nobody else has that many badges they have to be granted by the admins directly on request.

I only have two of those badges. Seq, acikek, sfrohne, etc. all have more than me (and deservedly too because I suck at everything).

Your profile description has you simping for some of the same people you say are a cabal now.

There's not a proper cabal yet. Most of them are just mindlessly having fun in RCP, or in the case of discord mods don't notice anything. The admins just give them special treatment and that's about it, but that's a big deal.

This is the post that sparked his decision to switch from the Nonpolitical faction to the Nazi faction.

Wdym?
